short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Appends present value of each investment you have done

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Appends present value of each investment you have done. To use just goto detail view of any of the funds you have invested in by clicking on it.

This is an open-source project & code can be accessed here - https://github.com/hnprashanth/fundzmagic-present-value
Contributions welcome :-)
